home_hero_description: Master the art of writing meaningful commit messages with our comprehensive guide to conventional commits, Git workflows, and GitHub best practices. Learn from examples, practice with our tools, and improve your development workflow.
home_features_generator_description: Create perfect commit messages with our interactive generator
home_features_examples_description: Browse real-world examples from popular open source projects
home_features_validator_description: Validate your commit messages against conventional standards
home_features_guide_description: Comprehensive guide to conventional commit best practices
home_cta_title: Ready to Transform Your Git Workflow?
home_cta_description: Join thousands of developers who write better commit messages and maintain cleaner project histories. Master conventional commits with our comprehensive tools and guides.
